item.title: explaining GBA Real-Time Clock (RTC)
item.description: intro there’s not much documentation online about how the GBA RTC works, so this blog post will attempt to demystify that.

item.title: rice ideas
item.description: some wip notes on ideas for a new i3 rice. colors same background, but in different color themes, cycling based on time of day or day of the week.
